hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /var/www/html/eol_php8_code/update_resources/connectors ### This will overwrite any current download request. ### Run this once ONLY every harvest per taxon group, this case per country.
#php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"GBIF_Netherlands"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"GBIF_France"}' #sleep 1h #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"GBIF_Germany"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"GBIF_Brazil"}' #sleep 1h #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"GBIF_Sweden"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"send_download_request", "taxon":"GBIF_UnitedKingdom"}' #sleep 1h
### Will wait for another hour to check if downloads are ready sleep 1h
### This will generate the .sh file if download is ready. ### The .sh file is the curl command to download. php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"GBIF_Netherlands"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"GBIF_France"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"GBIF_Germany"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"GBIF_Brazil"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"GBIF_Sweden"}' #php gbif_download_request.php jenkins '{"task":"generate_sh_file", "taxon":"GBIF_UnitedKingdom"}'
# orig post build: # 02 Check if ready to start
